urls.title: Aeroméxico
urls.description: If the country you wish to travel to requires a PCR test for entry, please check the following information. Learn more Get preferential costs and delivery times for your COVID-19 detection test. For you own safety and that of others, the use of face masks is mandatory both in the airport and throughout your journey. A negative COVID –19 PCR test result is not required to travel to or within Mexico. However, you may need to provide a negative test result if you have a connecting flight from Mexico to a

data.text: @jaclynaleina In the following links you can check the requirements to enter each country in which Aeromexico has a presence: https://t.co/YDQlAjI41A or https://t.co/Gz2wmlgklR. *OO

Check-in from anywhere with our app! https://t.co/Oh9qmAMMuP

@bbyghaiii In this case for payments it is only through our call center at 800 237 6639. One of our executives is going to assist you. *HS

@GrassSideDown Thank you, in this case we see that the fare purchased is not refundable so it is not possible to refund it as you are requesting. If you are having troubles for using your voucher please contact us at 800 237 6639. *HS
@GrassSideDown Kyle, What is your case number? please share it through DM. *HS
